name: RELAX match 3 game
description: Relax Match 3 Game is a classic representative of its genre, designed for relaxing gaming sessions. Your task is to click on the circles when they are lined up in certain colors. You also have health, which will decrease from combinations of red. The game has a high score table, thanks to which you can compete with your friends. Do not forget that there are other games from us, more detailed in the game in the help tab.
